alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Cuyahoga; Erie; Huron; Lake; Lorain; Wyandot (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 01 at 9:56AM EST until February 04 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM WEDNESDAY TO 7 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 10 to 13 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Lake, Lorain, Cuyahoga, Huron, Erie, Crawford and Wyandot counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM Wednesday to 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. North winds 15 to 25 MPH will cause blowing and drifting of the snow and will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected Wednesday night through Thursday. Snowfall rates may exceed one inch per hour at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Crawford; Cuyahoga; Erie; Huron; Lake; Lorain; Wyandot
